column1: Large cracked towers, visually similar to hyperboloid cooling towers.
A large field littered with pieces of twisted, broken metal, clearly manufactured.
A plain covered with the bleached bones of large creatures, probably hundreds of years old.
Small, almost bucolic rolling hills, as far as the eye can see.
A deep canyon. The rushing wind flows through it, producing a disquieting whistling.
A broken mountain, its peak covered in the impact craters visible from miles away.
A crater-filled plain, each hole filled with water.
Deep fuming cracks in the earth.
